leve.name: Scourge of the Saplings
leve.description: After a terrible blight which wiped out almost a third of the trees in an area near Lifemend Stump, reforestation efforts have finally begun in earnest. Unfortunately, blight-carrying vilekin are hampering the process by infecting newly planted saplings before they can take root. Master Gabineaux is offering rewards to any adventurers willing to travel to the area and assist in the pests' eradication.
